name: Digtris
description:
A  cave adventure with tetris block excavating.

Mine your way to the diamonds and escape the flowing lava. The door is to the right!

Ten or more blocks in a row or in a column will make the blocks blow up.

Instructions:

WASD - move 

Left click - place a block
Right click - rotate blocks clockwise

Mouse wheel - rotate blocks both ways

Number keys 1, 2 & 3 - Change block

Collect enough gems to open the door!
